content.raw:
I changed them to match `gazebo/physics/Joint.hh` because I was trying to understand what `DARTJoint` was and was not implementing from `Joint`, which was really difficult to parse when the functions were randomly scattered throughout the definition.

I considered changing `gazebo/physics/Joint.cc` to match, but I was worried that would make the PR much much bigger and more difficult to review.
content.html:
I changed them to match gazebo/physics/Joint.hh because I was trying to understand what DARTJoint was and was not implementing from Joint, which was really difficult to parse when the functions were randomly scattered throughout the definition.

I considered changing gazebo/physics/Joint.cc to match, but I was worried that would make the PR much much bigger and more difficult to review.
